name: .KODU2
summary: Learn about .KODU2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a KODU2 file in Kodu Game Lab (Windows). To do so, double-click the file (on a computer with Kodu installed). The world your KODU2 file contains will then appear in Kodu's Load World menu. (If you already have Kodu open, you may have to return to the Main Menu before the world appears in your Load World menu.)
